programme.title: Shogun's Ninja
programme.desc: In the middle of the 16th century, Hideyoshi, a power hungry warlord sets out to destroy the Momochi clan. Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy raised by wild animals tries to adapt to human village life.

programme.title: Tenebre
programme.desc: A writer arrives in Rome only to find that somebody is using his novels as the inspiration and occasionally the means of committing murder. As the death toll mounts the police are more and more baffled, and the writer becomes more closely linked to the case than is comfortable.

programme.title: Banana Joe
programme.desc: Banana Joe lives in a tropical village in Africa which is unaffected by modern life. One day he discovers he needs a permit to operate his boat so goes off to the big city to get one. On the way he witnesses television, crooks and many delights for the first time as well as falling in love.

programme.title: Detroit 9000

programme.title: Hercules In The Haunted World
programme.desc: Hercules must journey to the depths of Hell in order to find a plant that will cure a poisoned princess.

programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: After the civil war, a hell-bent Confederate Army Officer and his sons rob a Union Caravan carrying a fortune, killing every man and beast in the process. They hide the money in an empty coffin and hire a woman to pose as a widow to a dead officer to make it look official. Now they must con and fight their way across the west through thousands of cavalry, lawmen, bounty hunters, and Indians to make their escape.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: To find her independence outside the White House, Samantha Mackenzie, daughter of the US President, leaves for college and falls in love with a student who is hiding a secret.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: While playing on a cruise ship, the chipmunks and the chipettes take their pranks too far and end up stranded on a tropical island, only to discover it is not as deserted as it seems.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Fallen from grace, ill-tempered chef Adam Jones returns to London, determined to reclaim his torn glory by leading his crew towards the third michelin star.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: New-York based lawyers Audrey and Daniel, who often compete against each other, get married. However, they find it difficult to learn to draw lines between their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: Five couples from Atlanta buckle up to deal with the joys and sorrows of having a baby for the first time. However, they soon realise that parenthood demands a lot more than they anticipated.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
programme.desc: A recent Harvard Law graduate, Elle Woods campaigns for Bruiser's Bill in Washington DC. She overcomes many obstacles to win her fight against animal testing.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
programme.desc: A recent Harvard Law graduate, Elle Woods campaigns for Bruiser's Bill in Washington DC. She overcomes many obstacles to win her fight against animal testing.
